description.en: Concordium offers a trustable state-of-the-science solution with self-sovereign identification at the protocol level and confidentiality using Zero Knowledge Proof cryptography.Concordium Blockchain is designed and built to provide a distributed execution platform that supports regulatory compliance for Fintech and other industries. Network fees are low, predictable and stable in Euro terms.Concordium proposes the most trustable state-of-the-science solution with self-sovereign identification at the protocol level and confidentiality thanks to ZKP cryptography.
